actions.Multiattack: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.Intoxicating Touch: Melee Spell Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.
